recipesJson.name: Chinensis
recipesJson.author: Horsegame
recipesJson.description: I love the flavour of lychee, but I often find it too floral and syrupy. So my goal in this mix was to use the flavour in a way that is light and refreshing but without the floral and syrupy qualities and turn it in to something ADVable. So here ya go. A nice blend of Lychees and berries.
